nodes.text: Greg Dove is a Star Wars fan who submitted the NR-5 maintenance droid to West End Games as part of "The Fantastic Technology Contest," a contest sponsored by the Role Playing Game Association Network, placing 17th out of about 75 entries. As a result, it was included in Galladinium's Fantastic Technology, a Star Wars Legends supplement written by Rick D. Stuart for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and released on June 1, 1995,
